dcterms:creator: A. Toral
A. Way
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 133 parallel novels (over 1 million sentence pairs) and around 1,000 monolingual novels in the target language (over 5 million sentences) used for training machine translation systems.
dcterms:title: Parallel novels for training

dcterms:creator: A. Toral
A. Way
dcterms:description: A dataset made up of 2,000 sentence pairs randomly selected from the parallel training data, used to evaluate the systems during training.
dcterms:title: Development data

dcterms:creator: A. Toral
A. Way
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 12 English novels and their translations by professional literary translators into Catalan, used to evaluate the systems after training.
dcterms:title: Test data

dcterms:creator: A. Toral
A. Way
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising generic training data, both parallel and monolingual, used to supplement the domain-specific training data.
dcterms:title: Generic training data
